verses.roman:
sahadevaṁ dakṣiṇasyām
ādiśat saha sṛñjayaiḥ
diśi pratīcyāṁ nakulam
udīcyāṁ savyasācinam
prācyāṁ vṛkodaraṁ matsyaiḥ
kekayaiḥ saha madrakaiḥ

synonyms: sahadevam—Sahadeva; dakṣiṇasyām—to the south; ādiśat—he ordered; saha—with; sṛñjayaiḥ—the warriors of the Sṛñjaya clan; diśi—to the direction; pratīcyām—western; nakulam—Nakula; udīcyām—to the north; savyasācinam—Arjuna; prācyām—to the east; vṛkodaram—Bhīma; matsyaiḥ—the Matsyas; kekayaiḥ—the Kekayas; saha—together with; madrakaiḥ—and the Madrakas.
translation: He sent Sahadeva to the south with the Sṛñjayas, Nakula to the west with the Matsyas, Arjuna to the north with the Kekayas, and Bhīma to the east with the Madrakas.
